message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd really find valuable. I'm offering it to you for $140.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $130. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $130?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $130. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I'll do my best to stay within my budget. Could we possibly agree on $132 for the product?
